page.title: 11CAPENHURST SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Local residents are reasonably happy with life but have the following worries:Increased urbanisation-the area is Green Belt land between Chester and Ellesmere Port and builders are constantly attempting to acquire more land.this leads to increased vandalism on farmland by people who often don't realise the damage they are doing nor even care.Road Safety-the narrow,often unlit & unpavemented country roads were not built for the increased traffic from BNFL.There is no speed restriction on traffic.Transport- Capenhurst has no bus service or local shop.A bus,even if only on Saturdays would help residents reach the shopping and recreational centres. Pollution-Fumes from industrial Ellesmere Port & Stanlow cause concern.
